job.title: Data Scientist Jr
job.description: YOUR NEXT STEP IS AT RAPPIbrbrRappi is one of the first Latin American unicorns and a startup that continues to focus on growing and making life easier for our users As a company we seek to continue improving the services we already offer add more to our offer and continue expanding throughout the Latin American continentbrbrRappi is the fastest growing Latin American startup backed by the worlds top investors including Sequoia Andreesen Horowitz Y Combinator and Softbank We reached unicorn status last year and havent slowed down We operate in 100 cities across 9 countries in Latin America with large hubs in Mexico City Bogot So Paulo and Buenos AiresbrbrAt Rappi no two days are the same We love to hustle work hard for a greater good and strive to be the leading tech company in Latin America Rappi is growing at a tremendous rate and this position is crucial in our pursuit of a gamechanging experience for our users and partnersbrbrMain ResponsibilitiesbrulliAssists with deep data sets analysis for operations and management decisionsliliCreate maintain and optimize reports including SQL statements views functions and stored proceduresliliSynthesize large complex data sets into impactful insights and build analytical stories that shape the operations roadmap and culminate in strategic business decisionsliliWork with product management teams to process clients requests and help translate this feedback into product requirementsbrliulKey RequirementsbrulliBachelors degree in Mathematics Data Management Marketing Statistics Physics Computer Science a related field minimum 3 years experience working on business analytics projects preferredliliExperience working with large data sets and strong practical knowledge of analytical techniquesliliStrong knowledge building dashboards on Data studio o Power BIliliExperience in data analysis reporting market research segmentation and data modelingliliDemonstrated analytical and problemsolving skills with a bias for action integrity and accountabilityliliStrong teamwork and client service orientation liliStrong SQL skills liliFluent in English written amp spoken liulHe ledo y acepto la Autorizacin de Datos
